p: After the identification of themes through coding of the workshop data, these themes were compared and contrasted to reveal underlying categories with relevance to the research topic ( Ritchie et al., 2014). To ensure that the identified categories were robust and properly grounded in the data, results were checked by co-authors not involved in the analysis, following Bitsch (2005). In addition, intermediate findings were presented and discussed at an internal MACSUR project meeting.
